rich-page.field:
Plans and Releases

## Reported By #set($infoText = "Reported by $transaction.users().getBy().id($securityService.getCurrentUser()).render()<br/>$date.long") #if($widgetContext.target().isEditor()) <div style="color: grey; text-align: left;">$infoText<div> #elseif($widgetContext.target().isPdf()) <div style="color: grey; text-align: right; position: absolute; top: 22px; right: 10px;">$infoText<div> #elseif($widgetContext.target().isPrint()) <div style="text-align: right; position: absolute; top: 35px; right: 10px;">$infoText<div> #end

## List of Releases <style> .polarion-rpw-table-header-wiki th { vertical-align: top; text-align: left; padding: 0px 4px; height: 28px; color: #757575; font-weight: normal; border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D7DA; background-color: #FFF; } </style> #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($query = "template.id:release AND project.id:$projectId") #set($sortBy = "status dueDate") #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").plans().query("$query").sorting("$sortBy").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($plans = $transaction.plans().search().query("$query").sort("$sortBy")) #set($planCount = $plans.size()) #set($main = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").document("Planning", "Release Report").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) <div id="polarion-rp-widget-content"> ## Sidebar Preparation START #set($builderWithSidebar = $transaction.context().createHtmlFragmentBuilderFor().rpeView()) ## Sidebar: Configure displayed fields - #set($displayedFields = ["field1", "field2", ...] #set($displayedFields = ["releasePlan", "status", "resolution", "releasePM", "releaseQA", "featureFreezeDate", "codeFreezeDate", "publicLaunch", "build", "buildId", "releaseTestEvidence", "linkedWorkItems"]) ## Sidebar: Choose unique ID - #set($myContainerId = "myUniqueId") #set($myContainerId = "listOfReleasesWithSidebar") #set($sidebarConfiguration = $renderingContext.propertiesSidebarConfiguration().containerId("$myContainerId").fieldIds($displayedFields).addTo($builderWithSidebar)) #set($pathAttr = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().referencePath()) #set($clickClass = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().clickableCssClass()) ## Sidebar Configuration END ## Sidebar: Assign a unique ID to the table that contains lines that should be clickable - <table id="$myContainerId"> <table class="polarion-rpw-table-main" id="$myContainerId"> <tbody> <tr> <td> <table class="polarion-rpw-table-content"> <tbody> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-header-wiki"> <th>Release Plan</th> <th>Status</th> <th>Progress</th> <th>Capacity</th> <th title="Total - To Do - Done"> <span> Work<br/> <small>Total - To Do - Done</small> </span> </th> <th> <span> Release<br/> <small>Status - Build ID - Public Launch - Build</small> </span> </th> </tr> #foreach($plan in $plans) <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row"> <td>$plan.render().withLinks()</td> <td>$plan.fields().status().render()</td> <td>$plan.fields().get("_progress").render()</td> <td>$plan.fields().capacity().render()</td> <td>$plan.fields().get("_totalWork").render() - $plan.fields().get("_remainingWork").render() - $plan.fields().get("_doneWork").render()</td> #set($wiReleaseQuery = "type:release AND releasePlan:$plan.getReference().id() AND project.id:$projectId") #set($wiReleaseResult = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$wiReleaseQuery")) #if($wiReleaseResult.size() == 1) #set($item = $wiReleaseResult.iterator().next()) #set($suffix = "?item=$item.getReference().id()") #set($itemLink = "$main$suffix") ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> <td class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$item.getReference().toPath()"> <span> <a style="font-size:1em;" target="_top" href="$itemLink">$item.render().withTitle()</a><br/> <small>       $item.fields().status().render() #if(!$item.fields().get("buildId").is().empty()) - $item.fields().get("buildId").render() #end #if(!$item.fields().get("publicLaunch").is().empty()) - $item.fields().get("publicLaunch").render() #end #if(!$item.fields().get("build").is().empty()) #set($buildId = "$item.fields().get('build').get().fields().id().get()") #set($buildLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").build("$buildId").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) - <a href="$buildLink" target="_top">Build</a> #end </small> </span> </td> #else <td></td> #end </tr> #end </tbody> </table> </td> </tr> <tr> <td class="polarion-rpw-table-footer"> <div class="polarion-rpw-table-counts"> <a href="$link" target="_top">$planCount items found</a> </div> <div class="polarion-rpw-table-open-in-table"> <a href="$link" target="_blank"> <img src="/polarion/ria/images/portlet/portletOpenInTable.png" title="Open in table"> </a> </div> <div class="polarion-rpw-table-show-query"> <img src="/polarion/ria/images/portlet/info.png" title="Show query" onclick="var style = getElementById('polarion_query').style; style.display = (style.display == 'block') ? 'none' : 'block';"> </div> <div id="polarion_query" class="polarion-rpw-table-query">$query</div> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> ## Sidebar: Render helper HTML fragment $builderWithSidebar </div>
Releases by Status Plan lucene template.id:release status true false 250px

Deliveries per Release

## Deliveries Per Release #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($main = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").document("Planning", "Release Report").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) ## Sidebar Preparation START #set($builderWithSidebar = $transaction.context().createHtmlFragmentBuilderFor().rpeView()) #set($displayedFieldsMap = $objectFactory.newMap()) ## Sidebar: Configure displayed fields for each group (i.e. Work Item type) - #set($displayedFieldsGroupID = ["field1", "field2", ...] ## Sidebar: Add each group to the Displayed Fields Map - #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("groupid", $displayedFieldsGroupID)) #set($displayedFieldsRelease = ["releasePlan", "status", "resolution", "releasePM", "releaseQA", "featureFreezeDate", "codeFreezeDate", "publicLaunch", "build", "buildId", "releaseTestEvidence", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("release", $displayedFieldsRelease)) #set($displayedFieldsEpic = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "epicEstimate", "targetVersion", "status", "resolution", "childStoryPoints", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("epic", $displayedFieldsEpic)) #set($displayedFieldsUserStory = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "status", "resolution", "plannedIn", "storyPoints", "initialEstimate", "timeSpent", "remainingEstimate", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("userstory", $displayedFieldsUserStory)) #set($displayedFieldsIssue = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "occurredInVersion", "status", "resolution", "targetVersion", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("issue", $displayedFieldsIssue)) ## Sidebar: Choose unique ID - #set($myContainerId = "myUniqueId") #set($myContainerId = "deliveriesPerReleaseWithSidebar") #set($sidebarConfiguration = $renderingContext.propertiesSidebarConfiguration().containerId("$myContainerId").fieldsConfiguration($displayedFieldsMap).addTo($builderWithSidebar)) #set($pathAttr = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().referencePath()) #set($clickClass = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().clickableCssClass()) #set($wiFieldsKey = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().fieldsConfigurationKey()) ## Sidebar Configuration END ## Sidebar: Assign a unique ID to the table that contains lines that should be clickable - <table id="$myContainerId"> <table class="polarion-rpw-table-content" id="$myContainerId"> <thead> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-header-row"> <th>Release</th> <th>Delivered</th> <th>Status</th> <th>Priority</th> <th>Severity</th> <th title="Release: Release Plan | Epic: Epic Estimate | User Story: Estimate in Story Points | Issue: Occured in Version">Details</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> #set($releases = $transaction.workItems().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND type:release").sort("status ~publicLaunch")) #foreach($release in $releases) #set($releasePlan = $release.fields().get("releasePlan").get().getModelObject()) #set($suffix = "?item=$release.getReference().id()") #set($itemLink = "$main$suffix") #if($velocityCount < $releases.size()) #set($isLastRelease = false) #else #set($isLastRelease = true) #end ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$release.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="release"> <td colspan="2"><b><a style="font-size:1em;" target="_top" href="$itemLink">$release.render().withTitle()</a></b></td> <td colspan="3">$release.fields().status().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Release Plan:</span> $releasePlan.render()</td> </tr> #set($epicsQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:epic AND status:verified AND targetVersion.KEY:$releasePlan.fields().id().get()") #set($epics = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$epicsQuery").sort("status ~priority")) #set($storiesQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:userstory AND status:verified AND PLAN:($releasePlan.getReference().toPath())") #set($stories = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$storiesQuery").sort("status ~priority")) #set($issuesQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:issue AND status:verified AND targetVersion.KEY:$releasePlan.fields().id().get()") #set($issues = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$issuesQuery").sort("~priority")) #foreach($epic in $epics) ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$epic.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="epic"> <td></td> <td colspan="2">$epic.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$epic.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$epic.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Epic Estimate:</span> $epic.fields().get("epicEstimate").render()</td> </tr> #end #foreach($story in $stories) ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$story.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="userstory"> <td></td> <td colspan="2">$story.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$story.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$story.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Estimate in Story Points:</span> $story.fields().get("storyPoints").render()</td> </tr> #end #foreach($issue in $issues) #if($velocityCount < $issues.size()) #set($isLastIssue = false) #else #set($isLastIssue = true) #end ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$issue.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="issue" #if($isLastIssue && !$isLastRelease)style="border-bottom: 3px solid #F0F0F0;"#end> <td></td> <td colspan="2">$issue.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$issue.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$issue.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Occured in Version:</span> $issue.fields().get("occurredInVersion").render()</td> </tr> #end #end </tbody> </table> ## Sidebar: Render helper HTML fragment $builderWithSidebar

Delivered by Type WorkItem luceneVelocity (HAS_VALUE:targetVersion.KEY OR PLAN:(*)) AND status:verified AND type:(userstory epic issue) type true false 250px

Not Delivered per Release Plan

## Not Delivered Per Release Plan #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($main = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").document("Planning", "Release Report").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) ## Sidebar Preparation START #set($builderWithSidebar = $transaction.context().createHtmlFragmentBuilderFor().rpeView()) #set($displayedFieldsMap = $objectFactory.newMap()) ## Sidebar: Configure displayed fields for each group (i.e. Work Item type) - #set($displayedFieldsGroupID = ["field1", "field2", ...] ## Sidebar: Add each group to the Displayed Fields Map - #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("groupid", $displayedFieldsGroupID)) #set($displayedFieldsEpic = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "epicEstimate", "targetVersion", "status", "resolution", "childStoryPoints", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("epic", $displayedFieldsEpic)) #set($displayedFieldsUserStory = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "status", "resolution", "plannedIn", "storyPoints", "initialEstimate", "timeSpent", "remainingEstimate", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("userstory", $displayedFieldsUserStory)) #set($displayedFieldsIssue = ["assignee", "severity", "priority", "occurredInVersion", "status", "resolution", "targetVersion", "linkedWorkItems"]) #set($void = $displayedFieldsMap.put("issue", $displayedFieldsIssue)) ## Sidebar: Choose unique ID - #set($myContainerId = "myUniqueId") #set($myContainerId = "notDeliveredPerReleasePlanWithSidebar") #set($sidebarConfiguration = $renderingContext.propertiesSidebarConfiguration().containerId("$myContainerId").fieldsConfiguration($displayedFieldsMap).addTo($builderWithSidebar)) #set($pathAttr = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().referencePath()) #set($clickClass = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().clickableCssClass()) #set($wiFieldsKey = $sidebarConfiguration.attributes().fieldsConfigurationKey()) ## Sidebar Configuration END ## Sidebar: Assign a unique ID to the table that contains lines that should be clickable - <table id="$myContainerId"> <table class="polarion-rpw-table-content" id="$myContainerId"> <thead> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-header-row"> <th>Release</th> <th>Work Item</th> <th>Status</th> <th>Priority</th> <th>Severity</th> <th title="Release Plan: Release | Epic: Epic Estimate | User Story: Estimate in Story Points | Issue: Occured in Version">Details</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> #set($releases = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND template.id:release").sort("~startDate")) #foreach($release in $releases) ## com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.plan.Plan $release #if($release.utils().isFinished()) #set($release = $release.utils().getFinishedPlan()) #end #if($velocityCount < $releases.size()) #set($isLastRelease = false) #else #set($isLastRelease = true) #end <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row"> <td colspan="2"><b>$release.render().withLinks()</b></td> <td colspan="3">$release.fields().status().render().withText(false)</td> #set($releaseWIs = $transaction.workItems().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND releasePlan.KEY:$release.fields().id().get()")) #if($releaseWIs.size() == 1) #set($releasePlan = $releaseWIs.iterator().next()) #set($suffix = "?item=$releasePlan.getReference().id()") #set($itemLink = "$main$suffix") <td><span style="color: #757575;">Release Work Item:</span> <a style="font-size:1em;" target="_top" href="$itemLink">$releasePlan.render()</a></td> #else <td></td> #end </tr> #set($epicsQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:epic AND NOT status: verified AND targetVersion.KEY:$release.fields().id().get()") #set($epics = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$epicsQuery").sort("status ~priority")) #set($storiesQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:userstory AND NOT status: verified AND PLAN:($release.getReference().toPath())") #set($stories = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$storiesQuery").sort("status ~priority")) #set($issuesQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:issue AND NOT status: verified AND targetVersion.KEY:$release.fields().id().get()") #set($issues = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$issuesQuery").sort("~priority")) #foreach($epic in $epics) ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$epic.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="epic"> <td></td> <td>$epic.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$epic.fields().status().render().withText(false)</td> <td>$epic.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$epic.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Epic Estimate:</span> $epic.fields().get("epicEstimate").render()</td> </tr> #end #foreach($story in $stories) ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$story.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="userstory"> <td></td> <td>$story.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$story.fields().status().render().withText(false)</td> <td>$story.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$story.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Estimate in Story Points:</span> $story.fields().get("storyPoints").render()</td> </tr> #end #foreach($issue in $issues) #if($velocityCount < $issues.size()) #set($isLastIssue = false) #else #set($isLastIssue = true) #end ## Sidebar: Add click class to each row - <tr class="$clickClass"> ## Sidebar: Add path to the Work Item for each row - <tr $pathAttr="$workItem.getReference().toPath()"> ## Sidebar: Add wi fields key to each row to load proper group's configuration of displayed fields - <tr $wiFieldsKey="groupid"> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row $clickClass" $pathAttr="$issue.getReference().toPath()" $wiFieldsKey="issue" #if($isLastIssue && !$isLastRelease)style="border-bottom: 3px solid #F0F0F0;"#end> <td></td> <td>$issue.render().withLinks().withTitle()</td> <td>$issue.fields().status().render().withText(false)</td> <td>$issue.fields().priority().render()</td> <td>$issue.fields().severity().render()</td> <td><span style="color: #757575;">Occured in Version:</span> $issue.fields().get("occurredInVersion").render()</td> </tr> #end #end </tbody> </table> ## Sidebar: Render helper HTML fragment $builderWithSidebar

Not Delivered by Type WorkItem luceneVelocity (PLAN:(*) OR HAS_VALUE:targetVersion.KEY) AND NOT status:verified AND type:(epic userstory issue) type true false 250px

Found vs Fixed Issues per Release Plan

## Found vs Fixed Issues #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) <table class="polarion-rpw-table-content"> <thead> <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-header-row"> <th>Release</th> <th>Status</th> <th style="text-align: center;">Issues Found</th> <th style="text-align: center;">Issues Fixed</th> </tr> </thead> </tbody> #set($releases = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND template.id:release").sort("~startDate")) #foreach($release in $releases) #set($startDateMissing = $release.fields().startDate().is().empty()) #set($dueDateMissing = $release.fields().dueDate().is().empty()) #if(!$startDateMissing && !$dueDateMissing) #set($startDate = $release.fields().startDate().asString().replace("-", "")) #set($dueDate = $release.fields().dueDate().asString().replace("-", "")) #set($foundQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:issue AND created:[$startDate TO $dueDate]") #set($foundLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").workItems().query("$foundQuery").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($foundIssuesCount = $transaction.workItems().count().query("$foundQuery").result()) #set($fixedQuery = "project.id:$projectId AND type:issue AND targetVersion.KEY:$release.getReference().id() AND status:verified") #set($fixedLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").workItems().query("$fixedQuery").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($fixedIssuesCount = $transaction.workItems().count().query("$fixedQuery").result()) #end <tr class="polarion-rpw-table-content-row"> <td><b>$release.render().withLinks()</b></td> <td>$release.fields().status().render()</td> #if($startDateMissing || $dueDateMissing) #set($planProperties = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").plan("$release.getReference().id()").tabProperties().toEncodedRelativeUrl()) <td colspan="2"><a href="$planProperties" target="_blank" style="display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; text-align: center;">Enter plan's Start and Due Date first</a></td> #else <td><a href="$foundLink" target="_blank" style="display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; text-align: center;">$foundIssuesCount</a></td> <td><a href="$fixedLink" target="_blank" style="display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; text-align: center;">$fixedIssuesCount</a></td> #end </tr> #end </tbody> </table>
